name: ATGC
description:
GAMEPLAY:

Choose the correct pair in the DNA chain. The pairs are A/T and G/C. 

You have 1-2 seconds to select the pair so be quick!

You can make a total of 3 mistakes (not chosing anything counts as a mistake) before a mutation happens.

See how far you can get!

Controls

1, 2, 3 , 4 for selecting A, T, G, C

F to toggle fullscreen

ESC to exit the game

Made for Discord Jam #5 theme: Mutation

Code, art and sound effects by me

Music by Evokan
